kw.name: BuiltIn.Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: BuiltIn.Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Start Selenium Server
kw.doc: Starts the Selenium Server provided with SeleniumLibrary.
kw.msg: Selenium server log is written to /users/gturnquist/dropbox/python_testing_cookbook/code/05/selenium_server_log.txt.

kw.name: BuiltIn.Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by locator.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `text`.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `text`.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.name: SeleniumLibrary.Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and empties the connection cache.
